column7: Monuments, archaeological remains, and histories illustrating the development of the earliest states and urban centers of the Ancient Mediterranean, including Athens, Rome, Carthage, and Jerusalem. Same as ARTH 217 and JS 231. Prerequisite: Sophomore standing or consent of instructor.
